item.title: How to Serve Multiple Angular App from a Single Nginx Server
item.description: You have 2 angular projects, let’s call them Site1 and Site2, and you want to deploy them both on your nginx server. Base url of Site1 will be: https://{your_website}/site1 And for Site2: https://{your_website}/site2 Step 1: Build your angular projects # Build command for Site1 ng build --configuration=production --base-href=https://www.mkbaltz.com/site1/ --deploy-url=https://www.mkbaltz.com/site1/ # Build command for Site 2 ng build --configuration=production --base-href=https://www.mkbaltz.com/site2/ --deploy-url=https://www.mkbaltz.com/site2/ The –base-href and –deploy-url values will be used by angular as reference for its routing and locating of assets once deployed.
